column1: # This file defines the fusion partner domains for breakpoint detection.
#   partner_name    - Unique identifier matching sequence name in FASTA file
#   sequence_length - Length of the coding sequence in nucleotides
#   include         - Whether to include this partner in analysis (true/false)

column2: Met_WT) should NOT be listed here

column1: # - Sequence lengths should match the actual sequences in the FASTA file
